message.content:
cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.DS 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.AI - The paper combines Artificial Immune Systems (AIS) with Collaborative Filtering (CF) to build a movie recommendation system. This falls under the domain of Artificial Intelligence (AI) and hence, cs.AI is the most likely sub-category. 
2. cs.IR - Information Retrieval (IR) deals with the retrieval of relevant information from a large collection of data. In this paper, the authors use CF to recommend movies based on user preferences. Hence, cs.IR is also a likely sub-category. 
3. cs.LG - Machine Learning (ML) is a sub-field of AI that deals with the development of algorithms that can learn from data. The authors use different affinity measures to calculate correlation coefficients for the movie recommender. This involves the use of ML techniques and hence, cs.LG is a likely sub-category. 
4. cs.SI - Swarm Intelligence (SI) is a sub-field of AI that deals with the study of collective behavior in decentralized systems. The authors use AIS, which is a type of SI, to build the movie recommender. Hence, cs.SI is also a likely sub-category.
